description: 3-1/2 repeats; bkg. dark blue; Teasle dark blue/light blue and grey; white sparkles
image_copyright: Â© Heal%27s Fabrics%2C London%2C Jane Daniels%2C 1960
text: For centuries, from Asia to Europe, flowers have been a favorite subject matter for textile designers. Jane Daniels' unusual coloration and painterly interpretation, with its clearly desirable brush strokes, makes this a very distinctive mid-20th century textile.
title: Teasle
